other_tests.procedure_name: Direct sequence analysis of CASR gene exons
other_tests.findings: Identified a heterozygous mutation (F788L) in exon 7 in probands III-2 and III-3; normal genotype in father II-1 and brother III-1.
Demonstrated evidence of approximately 10% of the mutant allele in the mother (II-2); normal genotypes in father (II-1) and brother (III-1).
F788L mutant showed significant leftward shift in the dose-response to extracellular calcium compared to wild-type CASR.
Confirmed family relationships with a probability of more than 99.9%.

other_tests.procedure_name: Subcloning of CASR exon VII and restriction enzyme analysis
other_tests.findings: Identified mosaicism in the mother (II-2) with a finding of 9% mutant CASR; probands III-2 and III-3 were heterozygous.
